summary: A quick, clean starter website for Cypress Bridge Candle Co., featuring a warm, minimal layout with essential pages and sections to showcase hand‑poured candles and gift items, plus easy contact access.
sections: Hero banner with tagline and primary CTA
style_notes: Warm, earthy color palette (amber, soft browns, cream). Use high‑resolution candle photography, subtle animations, responsive typography. Keep layout uncluttered with generous whitespace and easy navigation.
assets_needed: High‑resolution product photos (at least 4–6 key candles)
Background image for hero banner (e.g., candlelit scene)
Google Maps embed or map image for address
Optional: short video clip of candle pouring
